## selectFeature variable

Returns a selector that selects the given feature

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
selectFeature: <S, FS = any>(idOrModuleId: string | ReduxFeatureModuleId<S, FS>, aDefaultState?: S) => UnaryFunction<ReduxRootState, S>
```
